description: This file defines an abstract interface class `IOmiProxy` within the `omi` namespace. The interface includes methods for mounting and unmounting encrypted bundles, as well as registering and unregistering error listeners, presumably for a proxy component interacting with an omi_dbus_api. It serves as a contract for concrete implementations that handle communication with OMI (Open Management Infrastructure) services, likely in a system involving containerized or secured resources.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class that provides methods for managing crypted bundles and error listeners in an omi proxy context

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts an encrypted bundle given container id, file paths, and outputs the decrypted config payload path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts the encrypted bundle associated with the given container id.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener, returning a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener by its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
